articles.description: The campaign also offers other prizes like discounts, and it seems to be for Europe and India. The launch of the OnePlus Nord CE4 Lite in India is just a...
articles.content: The launch of the OnePlus Nord CE4 Lite in India is just a couple of days away now. As part of the launch campaign, OnePlus is holding a giveaway. As per the promotional conditions, OnePlus will dist… [+827 chars]
